{{info}}Below some example of valid cron expression, from the [[official quartz scheduler documentation>>http://www.quartz-scheduler.org/documentation||rel=__blank]]:
|= Cron expression |= Meaning | **0 15 10 * * ?** | Fire at 10:15am every day | **0 15 10 ? * MON-FRI** | Fire at 10:15am every Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday and Friday | ** 0 0/5 14 * * ?** | Fire every 5 minutes starting at 2pm and ending at 2:55pm, every day | ** 0 15 10 ? * 6L** | Fire at 10:15am on the last Friday of every month {{/info}}
